mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule( sch_num, sch_date, sch_start, sch_end, hall_num, movie_num) VALUES( schedule_seq.nextval, #{sch_date}, #{sch_start}, #{sch_end}, #{hall_num}, #{movie_num})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule s JOIN hall h ON s.hall_num = h.hall_num JOIN movie m ON s.movie_num = m.movie_num JOIN theater th ON h.th_num = th.th_num
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET m_title=#{m_title}, hall_num=#{hall_num}, sch_date=#{sch_date}, sch_start=#{sch_start}, sch_end=#{sch_end} WHERE sch_num=#{sch_num}
